parameters.message: With a hard grip, he grabs my hand and I feel like he is really welcoming me, and not doing this as an obligation of some kind.
"I am Hameru Tabe. How did you know I'm new around here?"
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh, well. I know everyone around here. And I think everyone knows me!"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.message: "I am your designated tour guide. Maybe you should call me Keisuke-senpai haha"
parameters.name: Keisuke

parameters.button0Text: [OPT] "Oh, we'll see about that. So, where should we start?"
parameters.button1Text: [OPT] "Okay, Keisuke-senpai. What will you show me first?"
